base_description: Silver, curved faucet with dual handles.
part_description: Two cylindrical handles on either side of a curved spout, mounted on a rectangular base.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control water flow through the spout. Turning a handle adjusts the water temperature and pressure, directing it through internal channels to the spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet connects to plumbing for water supply. Users rotate handles to release water, directing it into sinks or basins for washing or cleaning tasks.
